item.title: 设计模式：建造者&原型模式
item.description: 建造者模式 假设通过如下方式创建对象： public class ResourcePoolConfig { private static final int DEFAULT_MAX_TOTAL = 8; private static final int DEFAULT_MAX_IDLE = 8; private static final int DEFAULT_MIN_IDLE = 0; private String name; private int maxTotal = DEFAULT_MAX_TOTAL; private int maxIdle = DEFAULT_MAX_IDLE; private int minIdle = DEFAULT_MIN_IDLE; //..省略部分成
